
orig_files/
	These are what I can find of the files that TooMuchWork2 (Tom Stonich <tstonich@msn.com>)
	provided to me, or I downloaded from 

	http://us.kontron.com/products/boards+and+mezzanines/io+and+communication+products/
		industrial+io+boards/digital+ttl+boards+pciisa/pcidioxxs.html

	before it went away.

DIO-ACCES32.zip
	Downloaded from http://accesio.com/files/DIO-ACCES32.zip. Resembles the sample files I might
	have worked from.
